page.title: 06EMPLOYMENT IN MARKFIELD
page.content: My mum, dad, two brothers and sisters came from Hong Kong. My little sister and I were born in England. My mum and dad came to England to work. The first house we had was in Loughborough. We had a shop called Golden Chau.We then moved to Leicester to a shop with the same name. My dad found an advertisement in the paper for a cafe for sale. He went to Markfield to look at the cafe. He found it was pretty big so he bought it.He called it the Golden Lion. We have been in Markfield for three years.
